title: The Nets Coaching Staff Grows and the NBA Draft Rumor Mill | Real Ones
description:
Logan and Raja discuss Mike D’Antoni being added to Steve Nash’s coaching staff (7:50). Then they discuss how much you can trust predraft rumors (29:18) and each give out their Real One of the Week (52:44).
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
